gw.api.phone

Interface PhoneFields

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PhoneDelegateBase

    public interface PhoneFields
    This interface is designed to represent the three fields in a phone number. Classes implementing this interface instantiate objects that represent a single phone number. This interface should only be used by the Phone Widget.
    For example, the phone number +1-650-555-1212 x1234 can be broken down into. Country Code: US National Subscriber Number: 650-555-1212 Extension: 1234 The CountryCode field represents the country code of a phone number. See the link below for more details. The NationSubscriberNumber field represents the nationally significant portion of the phone number. This is usually the number to dial for domestic calls. The Extension field usually refers to an internal number in a private branch exchange.
    See Also:
    List of Country Codes, Phone Extensions, GWPhoneNumber is a more generic phone number interface.
